Interface Formula

    Comparable<Object>, CycObject
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FormulaSentence, Naut

extends CycObject

      • getArgs

        CycList<Object> getArgs()
        Returns:
        The arguments of this formula (including the arg0, or operator) as a CycList. Modifications to this list will be reflected back to the original Formula.
        See Also:
        for non-modifiable version.

        Returns:
